full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I 'BUL BA'I GSHEGS GTOR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(GTANG RAG GI MCHOD PA BZOD GSOL, DKYUS BZHIN BYA CES SKYES BU CHENPO DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL BA'I RIM PA LAG @004B LEN DANG 'DON CHA'I GO RIM MTHUN BA BGYI PA 'DI NA, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RANG SLOB MA DGE BSGOS BLO BZANG SHES RAB GNYIS KYIS DAD GUS PA'I SGO NAS BSKUL BA RTEN NAS, DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS GYI GRVA TSANG YOG KHAMS SU HU THUG THU ZHES 'BOD CING BA'I GZHAN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I BLO BZANG YE SHES DPAL BZANG PO ZHAL SNGA NAS KYIS SENGGE SKU SKYES ZHES GRAGS DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL PO NYID DO, ,'DI SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,`BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,)
